item.title: Algorithms Narrated
item.description:
Introduction

Building on the Git Animated series, I’ve started a new project called “Algorithms Narrated”. This series presents solutions to various algorithmic problems—think LeetCode—by narrating the thought process and steps involved in solving them.

The Series

I’ll be kicking off the series with a video on checking if a string is a palindrome, ignoring all non-alphanumeric characters.

The code presented in the video is in Java, and the video is narrated in English. Note that the solution I chose is just one of many possible solutions to the problem, and I encourage you to explore other approaches. Alongside the code, you’ll find a brief explanation that includes the problem statement, some test cases and the time complexity of the solution.
